item.title: Comment on *Ayn Rand: Writing a Gospel of Success* by MikeP
item.description:
...her Jewishness was about the text, crammed full of ideas, parables, paradoxes, questions, and arguments. Her fictional stories are moral and legal at the same time.

Egad.

There are other people in the world who question the morals and laws of human existence with ideas, parables, paradoxes, questions, and arguments. It is likely that most of them are not and never were Jewish.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/09/ayn-rand-writing-a-gospel-of-success.html?commentID=160813923

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/09/ayn-rand-writing-a-gospel-of-success.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=ayn-rand-writing-a-gospel-of-success
